author: TaeunKwon
body:
#### PR description:

This PR backports recent 2 upgrades on the Trigger Primitive algorithm in CMSSW_11_2_X, where 1TS Trigger Primitive scheme(PFA1') is widely used.  The two upgrades on TP are the fix on TP saturation effect(#34252) and correction on the timePhase definition in Pulse Containment Corrector(PCC)(#34572, #34805) each. The effect of changes of this PR are described in each PR and also presented in [presentation by Taeun Kwon](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1061449/contributions/4460835/attachments/2286772/3886949/Comissioning_1TS_Scheme_21Jul23.pdf) from slide 3 to 18.

#### PR validation:

A basic technical test was performed: `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos`

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

This is a backport of 3 PRs, #34252, #34572, and #34805
title: Backport Trigger Primitive Upgrades in CMSW_11_2_X
